about_the_game:
Japan Book

This Japan-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! All images are of Japanese icons or Japanese culture!


Explore the Land of the Rising Sun in this book!

Contents

The Japan book unlocks the following images:
  • Lantern - 26x60
  • Geisha - 45x89
  • Rice Bowl - 69x110
  • Mochi - 71x46
  • Sumo - 78x91
  • Jigokudani Monkey Park - 81x72
  • Origami Crane - 96x75
  • Chureito Pagoda - 100x105
  • Oni Mask - 100x139
  • Hachiko Statue - 101x81
  • Yoroi Samurai - 106x137
  • Seigaiha Pattern - 126x126
  • Tanabata Festival - 136x186
  • Kitsune - 150x193
  • Mount Fuji - 156x163
  • Kintsugi - 160x140
  • Dragon - 172x289
  • Storefront - 204x198
  • Hakone Shrine - 300x300
  • Bullet Train - 600x50

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Japan Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
